item.title: Trump admin live updates: Trump to deliver remarks at Museum of the Bible
item.description: President Donald Trump is scheduled to begin the week with an address on Monday morning at the Museum of the Bible in Washington.

item.title: Several killed in Jerusalem bus station shooting, police say
item.description: At least six people were shot dead at Jerusalem's Ramot Junction on Monday, Israeli police and emergency services said.

item.title: Kristi Noem joins 'Five Eyes' ministers at border security meeting in London

item.title: WATCH: President Trump doubles down on crackdowns in major US cities
item.description: ABC News' Selina Wang asked President Donald Trump on Sunday why his administration has been targeting Democratic cities, rather than cities in red st...

item.title: WATCH: Teen influencer becomes Catholic Church's 1st millennial saint
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has declared a 15-year-old computer whiz the Catholic Church's first millennial saint.
